game.name: Master Reboot
game.categories: Single-player, Steam Achievements, Steam Trading Cards, Partial Controller Support, Steam Cloud, Family Sharing
game.shortDescription: Imagine a world where death is no longer final, where precious memories are saved to enjoy forever, where your soul is immortal. Master Reboot is a haunting first-person sci-fi adventure.
game.shortDescriptionEn: Imagine a world where death is no longer final, where precious memories are saved to enjoy forever, where your soul is immortal. Master Reboot is a haunting first-person sci-fi adventure.

reviewHighlights.text: Its a basic horror game. Nothing ever feels revolutionary and nothing ever feels executed perfectly, but that's why I love it so much. It gave a compl...
